function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to prolonged stay-at-home orders and quarantine measures","Impact":"Increased risk of cluster outbreaks and transmission of contagious diseases within confined residential spaces","Mitigation":"Enhanced ventilation systems, regular sanitation of high-touch surfaces, and adherence to public health guidelines","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC (heating, ventilation, and air conditioning) systems with high-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, UV-C disinfection devices","People":"Residents, individuals in quarantine or isolation","Owner":"Public health authorities, building management, residents"},{"Description":"Negative psychological effects and mental health impacts of prolonged lockdown measures","Impact":"Higher prevalence of mood lability, depression, anxiety, irritability, insomnia, post-traumatic stress symptoms, alcohol abuse, and suicidal ideation","Mitigation":"Psychological support services, virtual counseling, community engagement activities, access to accurate information and mental health resources","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, mental health apps, virtual support groups","People":"Quarantined individuals, at-risk populations, residents experiencing social isolation","Owner":"Mental health professionals, community organizations, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Impact on non-communicable diseases (NCDs) due to decreased physical activity during lockdown","Impact":"Increased risk of NCDs such as cardiovascular diseases, diabetes, and obesity due to reduced physical activity","Mitigation":"Promotion of home-based physical activity, access to online fitness programs, nutritional support, and remote monitoring of chronic conditions","Technologies":"Fitness apps, wearable activity trackers, telehealth platforms, online nutritional counseling","People":"Individuals under lockdown, those with pre-existing NCDs","Owner":"Health and fitness professionals, public health agencies, technology providers"}]}
